title: RIA Novosti
summary: RIA Novosti (Russian: РИА Новости), sometimes referred to as RIAN (Russian: РИАН) or RIA (Russian: РИА) is a Russian state-owned domestic news agency, which since 9 December 2013 has operated under Rossiya Segodnya (Russian: Россия Сегодня). RIA Novosti is headquartered in Moscow. The chief editor is Anna Gavrilova.
